thread.title: THOMAS MARKS
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by THOMAS MARKS

author: THOMAS MARKS
title: THOMAS MARKS
text:
We received great support during the process along with fantastic follow-up with any issues that came long.
The staff was very knowledgeable and courteous. They were very understanding and they were quick to
re-act to any situation that came up. I would love to give names but I know that they had a great support staff
also. They made a very bumpy road seem very smooth. They ran the show instead of the show running them !!!!
Regards with many thank you's The results were in our favor.
Thomas Marks
eom
